Type.Name: ToggleSizeRequestedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ToggleSizeRequestedHandler(object o, ToggleSizeRequestedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ToggleSizeRequestedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ToggleSizeRequestedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ToggleSizeRequestedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ToggleSizeRequestedHandler is removed from the event.
